rooms.description: Open space for welcoming guests with wheelchair accessible entrance and ramp.

Adjacent to the living room, designed for family gatherings and wheelchair accessible pathways.

Cozy bedroom for guests; includes en-suite bathroom and accessible features.
Quiet study area with ample shelving and integrated lighting. Designed to promote concentration in accordance with Vastu principles.
Entertainment space with wheelchair access; designed using soundproofing materials and Vastu compliant layout for positive energy flow.
